user.title: Bytewatt Export Limiter
user.description: Configure Modbus connection to your Bytewatt inverter

data_description.modbus_host: IP address of the Bytewatt inverter (e.g., 192.168.20.29)

automation.title: Price Automation Settings
automation.description: Configure export curtailment based on electricity prices

data_description.price_entity: The entity ID of your electricity price sensor (e.g., Amber Electric)
data_description.price_threshold: Curtail export when price is at or below this value
data_description.curtailed_limit: Maximum export power in watts when curtailing (0 = no export)
data_description.poll_interval: How often to check price and update export limit
